data.title: Puma to Expand Reorganization as Quarterly Profit Drops
data.meta_description: Puma SE, Europe’s second-largest sporting-goods maker, said it will accelerate a reorganization after second-quarter profit fell 29 percent.
data.text:
Puma SE, Europe’s second-largest sporting-goods maker, said it will accelerate a reorganization after second-quarter profit fell 29 percent.

Net income dropped to 26.7 million euros ($32.4 million) from 37.6 million euros a year earlier, the Herzogenaurach, Germany-based company said today in a statementBloomberg Terminal. Sales rose 12 percent to 752.9 million euros.
